CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(animalos__Address__Street__s)), animalos__Address__Street__s & ', ', '') & animalos__Address__City__s & ', ' & TEXT(animalos__Address__StateCode__s) & ' ' & animalos__Address__PostalCode__s & ' ' & TEXT(animalos__Address__CountryCode__s)
CustomField.label: Full Address
